com.stabilit.scm.common.net.res.netty
Class NettyTcpRequest

java.lang.Object
  com.stabilit.scm.common.scmp.RequestAdapter
      com.stabilit.scm.common.net.res.netty.NettyTcpRequest
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRequest
public class NettyTcpRequest
extends RequestAdapter

The Class NettyTcpRequest is responsible for reading a request from a ChannelBuffer. Decodes scmp from a Tcp frame. Based on JBoss Netty.

Constructor Summary
NettyTcpRequest(org.jboss.netty.channel.MessageEvent event, java.net.InetSocketAddress localAddress, java.net.InetSocketAddress remoteAddress)
          Instantiates a new netty tcp request.
 
Method Summary
 void load()
          Load content on socket to the request.
